The video was originally posted on Faceb: 2020, with the claim that it was shot at Chandigarh's Kalka road during the lockdown.
Alt News: an organization specializing in fact-checking, received several requests to verify the video's authenticity through its official Android application.
Alt News conducted an investigation and: Ahmedabad, and was posted by The Times of India's official YouTube channel on February 12, 2020. This evidence proves that the video is unrelated to the recent nationwide lockdown in India.
